root.name: Stereo 3D Canvas (VTK)
root.description: Stereo vision support added to the 3D VTK canvas.
root.author: stef - Stephane Dallongeville
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2016-11-22 18:03:15
- Modified default view parameters. - Fixed possible dead lock and missing ROI objects.
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2015-03-27 13:05:35
Fixed compatiblity issue with Icy 1.6.1.0
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2014-09-03 15:40:51
Fix minor init bug and version number.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2014-09-03 15:35:02
